name: location_info
description: A geolocation service that determines the current geographical location based on the system's IP address. Provides details like city, country, coordinates, and timezone. Useful for location-aware applications and regional customization.

country.description: The country the machine is located in

region.description: The region/state the machine is located in

city.description: The city the machine is located in

latitude.description: The latitude of the machine's location

longitude.description: The longitude of the machine's location
